passages.name: Office
passages.text:
**laptop
A usual day at work.
Eon is extremely busy. @eon_working_lion
It is always like this, and she is exhausted.
[[Lion|Birch coming]]
passages.cleanText:
**laptop
A usual day at work.
Eon is extremely busy. @eon_working_lion
It is always like this, and she is exhausted.

passages.name: Birch coming
passages.text:
**footsteps
With the corner of her eye, Eon sees Birch approaching to her desk.  @eon_working_lion
Birch is a coworker she dislikes a lot. She is nasty and a little scary.
Eon: Argh...I bet she'll try to pass her work on to me.
Birch arrives with a big smile.
Birch: Hi, Eon.
[[Lion|Busy]]
[[Ox|Hi!]]
passages.cleanText:
**footsteps
With the corner of her eye, Eon sees Birch approaching to her desk.  @eon_working_lion
Birch is a coworker she dislikes a lot. She is nasty and a little scary.
Eon: Argh...I bet she'll try to pass her work on to me.
Birch arrives with a big smile.
Birch: Hi, Eon.

passages.name: Busy
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon barely looks up. @eon_working_lion
Eon: Hi...I am quite busy as you can see.
Birch: Oh of course. But you are the best at your job! I'm sure you'll be done in no time.
Eon doesn't say anything back.
Birch: Look, I am not gonna take much of your time. But I really need you help with something.
[[Lion|Said]]
[[Ox|Favor]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon barely looks up. @eon_working_lion
Eon: Hi...I am quite busy as you can see.
Birch: Oh of course. But you are the best at your job! I'm sure you'll be done in no time.
Eon doesn't say anything back.
Birch: Look, I am not gonna take much of your time. But I really need you help with something.

passages.name: Hi!
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: Hi Birch! How goes? @eon_hi_ox
Birch: Good, good...Look, I need your help with some work stuff.
Eon: Ehhh...Well I am quite busy myself...I don't think I have the time to do that.
[[Ox|Favor]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon: Hi Birch! How goes? @eon_hi_ox
Birch: Good, good...Look, I need your help with some work stuff.
Eon: Ehhh...Well I am quite busy myself...I don't think I have the time to do that.

passages.name: Said
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: As I said, I am busy. @eon_unhappy_lion
Birch: It's nothing much, just a little favor. Can you please handle the with the Turnip transportation risk calculations and pass it to boss by morning?
[[Lion|Wow]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon: As I said, I am busy. @eon_unhappy_lion
Birch: It's nothing much, just a little favor. Can you please handle the with the Turnip transportation risk calculations and pass it to boss by morning?

passages.name: Favor
passages.text:
**dialog
Birch: It's nothing much, just a little favor. Can you please handle the with the Turnip transportation risk calculations and pass it to boss by morning? @eon_think_ox
Eon: But that's like... Hours of work...
Birch rolls their eyes.
Eon: Also, that's not even a case I work on?
[[Ox|Date]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Birch: It's nothing much, just a little favor. Can you please handle the with the Turnip transportation risk calculations and pass it to boss by morning? @eon_think_ox
Eon: But that's like... Hours of work...
Birch rolls their eyes.
Eon: Also, that's not even a case I work on?

passages.name: Date
passages.text:
**dialog
Birch: Come ooon! Don't be so anal, just help a coworker out. I have a date tonight. You know for how long I've been chasing this handsome?
Ox: Look, normally I would. You know me. But I am already stressed with my deadline tomorrow. @eon_tired_ox
[[Ox|Talent]]
[[Lion|Wow]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Birch: Come ooon! Don't be so anal, just help a coworker out. I have a date tonight. You know for how long I've been chasing this handsome?
Ox: Look, normally I would. You know me. But I am already stressed with my deadline tomorrow. @eon_tired_ox

passages.name: Talent
passages.text:
**dialog
Birch: Why would you be stressed even? You are so talented! You're always on top of things. 
Eon: Yes, yes. But, I don't really know your case and then there is a lot to be done already. You know what I mean? @eon_confused_ox
[[Ox|Begging]]
[[Lion|Wow]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Birch: Why would you be stressed even? You are so talented! You're always on top of things. 
Eon: Yes, yes. But, I don't really know your case and then there is a lot to be done already. You know what I mean? @eon_confused_ox

passages.name: Begging
passages.text:
**dialog
Birch: Come ooon! Please, I'm begging you. I really need you to work on this today.
Eon: But I already told you I can't...Please just stop asking. eon_scared_ox
[[Ox|Pressure]]
[[Lion|Wow]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Birch: Come ooon! Please, I'm begging you. I really need you to work on this today.
Eon: But I already told you I can't...Please just stop asking. eon_scared_ox

passages.name: Pressure
passages.text:
**dialog
Birch: You know, I thought we were friends. I thought we got each other's back.
Eon: Yes we are friends! Please don't say that. It is nothing personal, I just don't have the time today. @eon_surprised_ox
[[Lion|Wow]]
[[Ox|No]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Birch: You know, I thought we were friends. I thought we got each other's back.
Eon: Yes we are friends! Please don't say that. It is nothing personal, I just don't have the time today. @eon_surprised_ox

passages.name: Wow
passages.text:
**explosion
Birch:A tiny favor for your coworker. @eon_angry_lion
Eon: Wow...Just wow! I am really amazed by how spiness you are! Good for you! 
Birch looks unhappy.
Eon: That's definitely a skill in corporate world. Why don't you walk around to find someone else to convince into doing your work so that wou can get paid to dine in middle class wanna be restaurants.
[[Lion|Bye]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
Birch:A tiny favor for your coworker. @eon_angry_lion
Eon: Wow...Just wow! I am really amazed by how spiness you are! Good for you! 
Birch looks unhappy.
Eon: That's definitely a skill in corporate world. Why don't you walk around to find someone else to convince into doing your work so that wou can get paid to dine in middle class wanna be restaurants.

passages.name: Bye
passages.text:
**explosion
There is a very uncomfortable silence for a moment. @eon_unhappy_lion
Birch: Okay than. I'll just leave.
Eon: Fuckin' bitch. Who does she think she is.
[[Lion|Next Day]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
There is a very uncomfortable silence for a moment. @eon_unhappy_lion
Birch: Okay than. I'll just leave.
Eon: Fuckin' bitch. Who does she think she is.

passages.name: Next Day
passages.text:
**coffee
Next day is no different than the day before. @eon_working_lion
Eon is just working hard. As usual.
Eon: Gosh, I am already tired. When is Friday again? 
She decides to go get some coffee.
[[Lion|Kitchen]]
passages.cleanText:
**coffee
Next day is no different than the day before. @eon_working_lion
Eon is just working hard. As usual.
Eon: Gosh, I am already tired. When is Friday again? 
She decides to go get some coffee.

passages.name: Kitchen
passages.text:
**eyes
As she is walking towards the kitchen she sees a crowd talking silently. 
Eon: Hey, what's up? @eon_walk_lion
They all stop talking at the same time. 
Eon goes to the coffee machine. 
Eon: What are you all acting so mysterious?
She turns back and no one is there any more. @sfx_evilLaughter
[[Lion|Rude]]
[[Ox|Awkward]]
[[Human|Suspicious]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
As she is walking towards the kitchen she sees a crowd talking silently. 
Eon: Hey, what's up? @eon_walk_lion
They all stop talking at the same time. 
Eon goes to the coffee machine. 
Eon: What are you all acting so mysterious?
She turns back and no one is there any more. @sfx_evilLaughter

passages.name: Rude
passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon: Omg, these people are just fuckin' rude! I hate this place, just hate it! @eon_unhappy_lion
She walks back to her desk. 
[[Ox|Anxiety]]
[[Human|Gossip]]
[[Lion|Anger]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Eon: Omg, these people are just fuckin' rude! I hate this place, just hate it! @eon_unhappy_lion
She walks back to her desk.

passages.name: Awkward
passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Eon: That was extremely awkward...I wonder if it is about me?
She walks back to her desk. @eon_confused_ox
[[Ox|Anxiety]]
[[Human|Gossip]]
[[Lion|Anger]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxQuestion
Eon: That was extremely awkward...I wonder if it is about me?
She walks back to her desk. @eon_confused_ox

passages.name: Suspicious
passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: Okay, that was sketchy. I bet they were talking about me. But I don't get it, what did I do? @eon_confused_human
She walks towards her desk.
[[Ox|Anxiety]]
[[Human|Gossip]]
[[Lion|Anger]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
Eon: Okay, that was sketchy. I bet they were talking about me. But I don't get it, what did I do? @eon_confused_human
She walks towards her desk.

passages.name: Anger
passages.text:
**fire
Eon senses that collegues are staring at her as whe is walking. @eon_walkUnhappy_lion
She feels the fire rising in her body.
She catches eye contact with one finally.
[[Lion|Yelling]]
passages.cleanText:
**fire
Eon senses that collegues are staring at her as whe is walking. @eon_walkUnhappy_lion
She feels the fire rising in her body.

passages.name: Anxiety
passages.text:
**ear
Eon senses that collegues are staring at her as she is walking. @eon_walkUnhappy_ox
Eon: This is very uncomfortable. I feel very anxious.
She hears whispers behind her. She knows people are talking about her.
Eon: What have I done? I don't understand.
She arrives to her desk.
[[Ox|Cry]]
[[Lion|Yelling]]
passages.cleanText:

passages.name: Gossip
passages.text:
**ear
Eon senses that collegues are staring at her as whe is walking. @eon_walkUnhappy_human
Eon: Okay, I am sure now that they were talking about me 100%.
She can hear whispers behind her. They are gossiping. About her.
Eon: I just need to figure out what happened.
She arrives to her desk.
[[Human|Browsing]]
passages.cleanText:
**ear
Eon senses that collegues are staring at her as whe is walking. @eon_walkUnhappy_human

She can hear whispers behind her. They are gossiping. About her.

passages.name: Yelling
passages.text:
**explosion
Eon: What is your problem? What is wrong with everyone? Just mind your of business!@eon_angry_lion
She is shaking at her desk.
[[Lion|Calm Down]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
Eon: What is your problem? What is wrong with everyone? Just mind your of business!@eon_angry_lion
She is shaking at her desk.

passages.name: No
passages.text:
**fire
Eon: I am sorry, but I just can't. Can I please go back to work? @eon_working_ox
Eon sees fire in Birch's eyes. She says nothing, and just walks away.
Eon: Pff, she is very insistent!
[[Ox|Tomorrow]]
passages.cleanText:
**fire
Eon: I am sorry, but I just can't. Can I please go back to work? @eon_working_ox
Eon sees fire in Birch's eyes. She says nothing, and just walks away.
Eon: Pff, she is very insistent!

passages.text:
**coffee
Next day is no different than the day before. @eon_working_ox
Eon is just working hard. As usual.
Eon: Gosh, I am already tired. When is Friday again? 
She decides to go get some coffee.
[[Ox|At Kitchen]]

Next day is no different than the day before. @eon_working_ox

Eon: Gosh, I am already tired. When is Friday again?

passages.name: At Kitchen
passages.text:
**eyes
As she is walking towards the kitchen she sees a crowd talking silently. 
Eon: Hey, what's up? @eon_walk_ox
They all stop talking at the same time. 
Eon goes to the coffee machine. 
Eon: What are you all acting so mysterious?
She turns back and no one is there any more.
[[Lion|Rude]]
[[Ox|Awkward]]
[[Human|Suspicious]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
As she is walking towards the kitchen she sees a crowd talking silently. 
Eon: Hey, what's up? @eon_walk_ox
They all stop talking at the same time. 
Eon goes to the coffee machine. 
Eon: What are you all acting so mysterious?
She turns back and no one is there any more.

passages.name: Browsing
passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: Let's see...Who can tell me what's happening? Who is the weakling? @eon_think_human
She is looking around the office, tracing every single face.
Eon: Damn, he fuckin' hates me.
She keeps looking, looking.
Eon: No, nope. Not them. No.
[[Human|Weakling]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
Eon: Let's see...Who can tell me what's happening? Who is the weakling? @eon_think_human
She is looking around the office, tracing every single face.
Eon: Damn, he fuckin' hates me.
She keeps looking, looking.
Eon: No, nope. Not them. No.

passages.name: Weakling
passages.text:
**exxMark
Finally her eyes spot a tiny person at the very far corner.@eon_approve_human
Eon: Bingo! I need to catch her at the lunch.
[[Human|Lunch]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Finally her eyes spot a tiny person at the very far corner.@eon_approve_human
Eon: Bingo! I need to catch her at the lunch.

passages.name: Cry
passages.text:
**cry
She just can't. Eon starts crying. @eon_cry_ox
She wants to keep it quiet but that seems not possible. She bursts into tears.  Leaning on her desk, she covers her tears.
"What have I done? I don't understand."
[[Ox|Creepy Folks]]
passages.cleanText:
**cry
She just can't. Eon starts crying. @eon_cry_ox
She wants to keep it quiet but that seems not possible. She bursts into tears.  Leaning on her desk, she covers her tears.
"What have I done? I don't understand."

passages.name: Lunch
passages.text:
**lunchBag
At lunch time, Eon is following her pray. Bingo always eats at his desk.
Rest of the office goes out for lunch. Noone asked Eon if she wanted to join. @sfx_evilLaughter @eon_walk_human
She slowly approaches Bingo.
[[Human|Bon Appetite]]
passages.cleanText:
**lunchBag
At lunch time, Eon is following her pray. Bingo always eats at his desk.
Rest of the office goes out for lunch. Noone asked Eon if she wanted to join. @sfx_evilLaughter @eon_walk_human
She slowly approaches Bingo.

passages.name: Creepy Folks
passages.text:
**eyes
Eon suddenly gets this awkward feeling as if someone is staring at her.
As she moves her head up, she sees all her coworkers gathered around her desk. Staring at her. Not saying a word. @eon_scared_ox 
"What the hell?!" @sfx_scream
[[Ox|Run]]
[[Lion|Yelling]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
Eon suddenly gets this awkward feeling as if someone is staring at her.
As she moves her head up, she sees all her coworkers gathered around her desk. Staring at her. Not saying a word. @eon_scared_ox 
"What the hell?!" @sfx_scream

passages.name: Run
passages.text:
**eyes
Eon:"What is wrong with you all?" @eon_scared_ox
They don't say a word. Just stare.
Eon:"Okay, you know what, I am fucking done with this." @eon_run_ox
She quicky grabs her bag and runs towards the door.
[[Ox|Mobbing]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
Eon:"What is wrong with you all?" @eon_scared_ox
They don't say a word. Just stare.
Eon:"Okay, you know what, I am fucking done with this." @eon_run_ox
She quicky grabs her bag and runs towards the door.

passages.name: Calm Down
passages.text:
**questionMark
Finally she is alone. @eon_unhappy_lion
Eon:"Where is all this nonsense coming from?"
She hears a laughter from the back corner of the office. @sfx_evilLaughter
She recognized the voice. It's Birch.
[[Lion|Wtf]]
[[Human|Browsing]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
Finally she is alone. @eon_unhappy_lion
Eon:"Where is all this nonsense coming from?"
She hears a laughter from the back corner of the office. @sfx_evilLaughter
She recognized the voice. It's Birch.

passages.name: Mobbing
passages.text:
**exit
Birch, watching Eon as she is running through the door, smiling. @eon_cry_ox
Birch:"What a shame...Another victim of mobbing." @sfx_evilLaughter
That was Eon's last day at work.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**exit
Birch, watching Eon as she is running through the door, smiling. @eon_cry_ox
Birch:"What a shame...Another victim of mobbing." @sfx_evilLaughter
That was Eon's last day at work.
@end

passages.name: Wtf
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_walkUnhappy_lion
As Eon is approaching Birch, she turns towards her with a sinister smile on her face.
Eon: "What did you tell them?"
Birch: "Hmm, I don't think I understand what you're talking about."
[[Lion|Stop]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_walkUnhappy_lion
As Eon is approaching Birch, she turns towards her with a sinister smile on her face.
Eon: "What did you tell them?"
Birch: "Hmm, I don't think I understand what you're talking about."

passages.name: Stop
passages.text:
**explosion
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: "WHAT DID YOU TELL THEM? I KNOW IT IS YOU, STOP PLAYING GAMES WITH ME"
Birch: "I think you need to chill." @sfx_evilLaughter
[[Lion|Fix This]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: "WHAT DID YOU TELL THEM? I KNOW IT IS YOU, STOP PLAYING GAMES WITH ME"
Birch: "I think you need to chill." @sfx_evilLaughter

passages.name: Bon Appetite
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:"Bon Appetite, Bingo"  @eon_hi_human
Bingo slowly turns his head towards Eon.
His mouth moves but nothing audible. @sfx_mumble
Eon: "Yeah bro..."
[[Human|Why]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon:"Bon Appetite, Bingo"  @eon_hi_human
Bingo slowly turns his head towards Eon.
His mouth moves but nothing audible. @sfx_mumble
Eon: "Yeah bro..."

passages.name: Why
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: "So, I need your input on something. I think people are talking about me. What happened?" @eon_talk_human
Bingo: "Mmrphgg..." @sfx_mumble
Eon: "Look, i understand you wanna play Switzerland in this game. But, I really need to know why this is happening."
Bingo doesn't say anything. Not a word.
[[Lion|Talk]]
[[Human|Turnip]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon: "So, I need your input on something. I think people are talking about me. What happened?" @eon_talk_human
Bingo: "Mmrphgg..." @sfx_mumble
Eon: "Look, i understand you wanna play Switzerland in this game. But, I really need to know why this is happening."
Bingo doesn't say anything. Not a word.

passages.name: Yum
passages.text:
**turnip
Bingo swallows the whole turnip. @sfx_eat
He seems happy, rubbing his tummy.
Bingo: "Ah, this was yummy."
Eon: "I know. Now it's time to tell me what's going on."
@eon_idle_human
[[Human|Retreat]]
passages.cleanText:
**turnip
Bingo swallows the whole turnip. @sfx_eat
He seems happy, rubbing his tummy.
Bingo: "Ah, this was yummy."
Eon: "I know. Now it's time to tell me what's going on."
@eon_idle_human

passages.name: Retreat
passages.text:
**dialog
 Bingo: "Okay. So you know everyone was so excited for the retreat. And I don't really understand why."  @eon_think_human
 Eon sighs.
 Bingo: "Well, that's on the fence now. Apparently our revenue is not as expected. So they are talking about budget cuts."
 Eon: "That sucks."
 Bingo: "And Birch told everyone you suggested the boss that we cancel the retreat." @sfx_evilLaughter
 [[Human|Framed]]
 [[Lion|Show Her]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
 Bingo: "Okay. So you know everyone was so excited for the retreat. And I don't really understand why."  @eon_think_human
 Eon sighs.
 Bingo: "Well, that's on the fence now. Apparently our revenue is not as expected. So they are talking about budget cuts."
 Eon: "That sucks."
 Bingo: "And Birch told everyone you suggested the boss that we cancel the retreat." @sfx_evilLaughter

passages.name: Framed
passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Eon: "What? But I didn't say that. I didn't even know." @eon_surprised_human
Bingo: "But that's what everyone is talking about."
Eon: "So that bitch just framed me huh?"
Bingo is not impressed at all.
Bingo: "Are we done here?"
[[Human|Plans]]
[[Ox|Wait]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxQuestion
Eon: "What? But I didn't say that. I didn't even know." @eon_surprised_human
Bingo: "But that's what everyone is talking about."

passages.name: Plans
passages.text:
**fire
Eon: "That fuckin' Birch... This is not over." @eon_unhappy_human
She goes back to her desk.
Eon: "I'll show you what it means to mess with me."
[[Human|Afternoon]]
passages.cleanText:
**fire
Eon: "That fuckin' Birch... This is not over." @eon_unhappy_human
She goes back to her desk.
Eon: "I'll show you what it means to mess with me."

passages.name: Wait
passages.text:
Eon: "That is just horrible. What a horrible person is Birch." @eon_scared_ox
She feels exhausted.
Eon: "Okay. I just need to talk to people when they get back from lunch."
But that wait felt just like forever.
[[Ox|Avoided]]
passages.cleanText:
Eon: "That is just horrible. What a horrible person is Birch." @eon_scared_ox
She feels exhausted.
Eon: "Okay. I just need to talk to people when they get back from lunch."
But that wait felt just like forever.

passages.name: Avoided
passages.text:
Eon starts walking around the office trying to talk to people. 
@eon_anxious_ox
They all just avoid her as she is apporaching.
Eon:"Hey!...Oh hi!...Hmmm...Ah, hi..."
No one bothers to listen to her. They don't even look at her place.
Eon finally grab someone's arm.
[[Ox|Not welcomed]]
passages.cleanText:
Eon starts walking around the office trying to talk to people. 
@eon_anxious_ox
They all just avoid her as she is apporaching.
Eon:"Hey!...Oh hi!...Hmmm...Ah, hi..."
No one bothers to listen to her. They don't even look at her place.
Eon finally grab someone's arm.

passages.name: Not welcomed
passages.text:
Coworker: "What are you doing? Let go of me immediately." @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: "Please just listen to me. I am not the reason the retreat is cancelled. It has nothing to do with me!"
Coworker: "Yeah yeah... You fuckin' minion! I don't wanna talk to you. No one in here does. You are not welcomed here."
Eon stays frozen for a second. How did things escaleted so fast?
She goes back to her desk.
[[Ox|Cry]]
passages.cleanText:
Coworker: "What are you doing? Let go of me immediately." @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: "Please just listen to me. I am not the reason the retreat is cancelled. It has nothing to do with me!"
Coworker: "Yeah yeah... You fuckin' minion! I don't wanna talk to you. No one in here does. You are not welcomed here."
Eon stays frozen for a second. How did things escaleted so fast?
She goes back to her desk.

passages.name: Afternoon
passages.text:
**fire
The whole afternoon she spends writing into her notebook. Calculating. Planning. @eon_sinister_human
People are still full of hatred. But Eon doesn't care.
Eon: "This looks good. Let's see who is the real player Ms. Birch!" @sfx_evilLaughter
[[Human|Boss Office]]
passages.cleanText:
**fire
The whole afternoon she spends writing into her notebook. Calculating. Planning. @eon_sinister_human
People are still full of hatred. But Eon doesn't care.
Eon: "This looks good. Let's see who is the real player Ms. Birch!" @sfx_evilLaughter

passages.name: Show Her
passages.text:
**explosion
@eon_walkUnhappy_lion
Eon: "WHAT!? I'LL KILL THAT BIRCH!"
She hears people coming back to the office. Birch is with them.
Eon sprints towards Birch.
[[Lion|Stop]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
@eon_walkUnhappy_lion
Eon: "WHAT!? I'LL KILL THAT BIRCH!"
She hears people coming back to the office. Birch is with them.
Eon sprints towards Birch.

passages.name: Fix This
passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon: "Listen to me. You'll tell everyone it was a misunderstanding. YOU'LL FIX THIS!" @eon_angry_lion
Birch: "Or what? I am not afraid of you. And I am not telling anyone anything."
Then she bends over to Eon and whispers: "I hope your day is as pleasant as you've made mine."
[[Lion|Attack]]
[[Human|Plans]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Eon: "Listen to me. You'll tell everyone it was a misunderstanding. YOU'LL FIX THIS!" @eon_angry_lion
Birch: "Or what? I am not afraid of you. And I am not telling anyone anything."
Then she bends over to Eon and whispers: "I hope your day is as pleasant as you've made mine."

passages.name: Attack
passages.text:
**explosion
Eon grabs Birch's hair and crashes her face into the wall. @sfx_scream @eon_angry_lion
People gather around to seperate them.
Birch is crying. "She attacked me. She is just mad. MAD!"
People are holding Eon. She is a burning fire. @sfx_roar

Eon just wants to leave asap.

passages.name: Boss Office
passages.text:
**dialog
Next day, Eon is at the Boss' office early in the morning. @eon_happy_human
Eon: "Boss, you've been so kind and caring to each one of us. I feel extremely lucky to be part of this team."
Boss: "And you are a great addition to the team as well! Tell me, what can I do for you?"
Eon:"Oh, you've already done too much! So, I am asking myself the question, what can I do for YOU?"
[[Human|Dangerous Waters]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog

passages.name: Dangerous Waters
passages.text:
**peach
Boss seems a little uncomfortable. @eon_confused_human
Boss: "Ehem... I am not sure what you mean by that. But I hope you are not swimming in dangerous waters."
Eon: "I'm sorry?"
Boss: "You know, ehem, peaches... And eggplants. I really appreciate your work, I don't need anything more than that."
[[Human|Warning]]
[[Lion|How dare]]

passages.name: Warning
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: "Oh, I see...No boss, I am not really into vegetables. I just wanted to say, you are such a giving and caring person. And I am not sure if everyone appreciates it the same way." @eon_surprised_human
Boss gets serious. "What do you mean?"
Eon: "Ehem...There someone in the team talking behind you. In a disgraceful way."
Boss: "Who is that and what do they say?"

This is absolutely offensive. eon_unhappy_lion
Eon: "How can you think I'd be offering you peaches and eggplants? How dare you talk to me like that!"
Now the boss is mad too.
Boss: "You come inside, kissing ass, what did you expect me to think?"

passages.name: Last Insult
passages.text:
**explosion
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: "Unlike you, some of us have dignity. You listen to everything your little minion Birch says and you call me an ass kisser?"
Boss is in shock, he doesn't say a word.
Eon goes to the door.
Eon: "Also, everyone in the office knows that you sneak out our office bread. You have a tremendous salary already whereas we work like slaves. Isn't your stomach just full yet?"
She slams the door leaving the room. @sfx_doorSlam

passages.name: Appropriate
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: "Oh, I don't think this is an appropriate conversation" @eon_think_eagle
Boss seems quite uncomfortable now.
Boss: "Well you are the one bringing that up!"
Eon: "You are the one who brought up peaches and eggplants. You know, I can report you for harassment."
Boss: "To whom? I am the boss. And this is not a corporate company."
[[Eagle|Help]]
[[Ox|Attractive]]

passages.name: Help
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: "That is a good point. So in that case, a good suggestion would be to help you design a process to overcome harassment at work." @eon_think_eagle
Boss: "What are you talking about?"
Eon: "I'd image you'd like your company to be a corporate at some point. So, you need to work on employee safety, anti-harassment policies etc."
[[Eagle|Good idea]]

**dialog

Boss is surprised. But he smiles with flattery.
Boss: "Really? Well, ehem, I know for some I have an irresistable charm."
Eon: "So please forgive me for coming on to you. I just couldn't help myself."

She knocks on the door and comes back.
